dcterms:creator: S. Khan
K. Goucher-Lambert
K. Kostas
P. Kaklis
dcterms:description: A dataset containing 52,591 designs of various ship types, including tankers, container ships, bulk carriers, tugboats, and crew supply vessels, which were geometrically and physically validated for training the ShipHullGAN model.
dcterms:title: 52,591 designs of various ship types

dcterms:creator: K. Kostas
A. Ginnis
C. Politis
P. Kaklis
dcterms:description: A series of datasets used for ship-hull shape optimization, which includes 5,000 design variations systematically created based on characteristic parameters.
dcterms:title: FORMDATA series

dcterms:creator: S. Khan
K. Goucher-Lambert
K. Kostas
P. Kaklis
dcterms:description: A dataset containing 3,000 synthetic variations of parent hulls created using a parametric approach, which allows for the exploration of diverse ship designs.
dcterms:title: 3,000 synthetic variations of parent hulls
